ol.li:

Let's use the same root directory for the origin, destination, and error files as follows:/<base directory>/tutorial/origin /<base directory>/tutorial/destination /<base directory>/tutorial/errorMake sure the user who started the has read and write permission for the directories.
Save the sample data in the origin directory.

If you haven't set up custom user accounts, you can use the admin account shipped with the . The default login is: admin / admin.
